Literature.Title: Improving the Therapeutic Index of Smp24, a Venom-Derived Antimicrobial Peptide: Increased Activity against Gram-Negative Bacteria
Literature.Author: Rawson KM, Lacey MM, Strong PN, Miller K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>512 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:LD50=72 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli JM109(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H085180216(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa H085180216(MBC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MBC=64µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(LD50=121µg/ml)
